participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and devoted, Emily loves the quiet life of the countryside and enjoys the company of her pets. She's passionate about hockey and follows the NHL closely.
participant_1.background: my husband is adopted. i live is a rural farming community. i've a german shepherd dog. i like to watch nhl hockey.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Creative and energetic, Jason thrives in the music scene and enjoys experimenting with different sounds. He's always looking for the next inspiration for his productions.
participant_2.background: i listen to rap music. i produce music for artists. my pets name is charlie. i drive a 2015 honda civic. my favourite food is pizza.
